# Get started with Visual Basic

> Documentation for Get started with Visual Basic.

*Topics available: 3*

- [Additional resources for Visual Basic programmers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/getting-started/additional-resources.md): Discover resources on the web for you to learn, ask questions and find out more information about Visual Basic.
- [Get started with Visual Basic](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/getting-started/index.md): Learn more about: Get started with Visual Basic
- [Visual Basic language strategy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/getting-started/strategy.md): Learn about the .NET team's strategy for development and maintenance of the Visual Basic programming language.
